extendedInfo.description: Take Mesa County Libraries with you wherever you go. The mobile version of Mesa County Libraries lets you search for and place holds on books, movies, and other resources. You can check the Calendar to see whatâs happening at the library, look up library locations and hours, ask librarians for help, connect with Mesa County Libraries on Facebook or Twitter, and easily renew items youâve checked out. You also can hook up with OverDrive, one of the largest distributors of e-books and audio-books.

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Will only keyword search, and the search function only works half the time. Would only renew one of the four titles I was trying to renew, have to do so individually, and when it wouldn\'t renew a book it said I had nothing checked out. Sent me to the website for OverDrive content, and last time I tried OverDrive won\'t let me check out anything via my cellphone. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: An amazing new way to explore.
reviews.author: Ayden Bird
